triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: AI is the domain being made more trustworthy through formal verification methods.

triples.name: Formal methods
triples.relevance: The paper proposes using formal methods as the foundational approach for AI system verification and validation.

triples.name: Software verification
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an approach to verify AI systems to ensure they meet their specifications.

triples.name: Software verification and validation
triples.relevance: The paper addresses both verification and validation as complementary approaches to ensuring AI system trustworthiness.
